description.zh-cn: 新加坡华人企业家及慈善家，主营地产业和百货业，是香港影视大亨邵逸夫的长子。
description.en: A Singaporean Chinese entrepreneur and philanthropist, primarily involved in real estate and department stores, and the eldest son of Hong Kong film mogul Run Run Shaw.

description.zh-cn: 香港影视大亨，邵维铭的父亲。
description.en: Hong Kong film mogul, father of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 邵逸夫的元配妻子，邵维铭的母亲。
description.en: The first wife of Run Run Shaw and mother of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡矿业大王郭洪之女，邵维铭的前妻。
description.en: Daughter of Singaporean mining tycoon Guo Hong and ex-wife of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 邵逸夫之兄，邵维铭的伯父及养父。
description.en: Brother of Run Run Shaw, and the uncle and adoptive father of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡矿业大王，郭碧瑜的父亲。
description.en: Singaporean mining tycoon, father of Guo Biyu.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭与郭碧瑜的独生女。
description.en: The only daughter of Shao Vee-Meng and Guo Biyu.

nodes.id: 牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院

zh-cn: 牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 牛津大学的组成学院之一，邵维铭的母校。
description.en: A constituent college of the University of Oxford, and the alma mater of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国牛津的世界顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A world-leading public research university located in Oxford, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的四所律师学院之一，邵维铭在此获得执业律师资格。
description.en: One of the four Inns of Court in London, where Shao Vee-Meng qualified as a barrister.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于新加坡的慈善基金会，由邵氏兄弟创立。
description.en: A charitable foundation based in Singapore, established by the Shaw brothers.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的华人宗乡会馆。
description.en: A Chinese clan association in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 在新加坡推广法国语言和文化的机构。
description.en: An institution in Singapore that promotes French language and culture.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的医疗慈善组织。
description.en: A medical charity organization in Singapore.

nodes.id: 新加坡国立预防犯罪协会

zh-cn: 新加坡国立预防犯罪协会

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的预防犯罪组织。
description.en: A crime prevention organization in Singapore.

nodes.id: 新加坡亚洲文明博物馆

zh-cn: 新加坡亚洲文明博物馆

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的一所博物馆。
description.en: A museum in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家。
description.en: A country in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚岛国，邵维铭的出生地及主要活动地。
description.en: An island city-state in Southeast Asia, the birthplace and main place of activity for Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 英国于19世纪至20世纪中叶在东南亚的殖民地，新加坡曾是其一部分。
description.en: A British colony in Southeast Asia from the 19th to the mid-20th century, of which Singapore was a part.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲太平洋地区的年度电影节。
description.en: An annual film festival in the Asia-Pacific region.

zh-cn: 法国国家荣誉军团司令级勋章

description.zh-cn: 法国政府颁授的最高荣誉勋章。
description.en: The highest order of merit awarded by the French government.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政府为表彰在公共服务领域做出宝贵贡献的个人而颁发的勋章。
description.en: A medal awarded by the Government of Singapore to individuals who have rendered valuable public service.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭是邵逸夫的长子。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng is the eldest son of Run Run Shaw.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭是黄美珍的儿子。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng is the son of Wong Mei-chun.

description.zh-cn: 因家族“对养”习惯，邵维铭年幼时由伯父邵仁枚抚养，视其为养父。
description.en: Due to the family tradition of 'cross-adoption', Shao Vee-Meng was raised by his uncle Shao Ren Me, whom he regarded as his adoptive father.

description.zh-cn: 黄美珍是邵逸夫的元配妻子。
description.en: Wong Mei-chun was the first wife of Run Run Shaw.

description.zh-cn: 邵仁枚是邵逸夫的兄长。
description.en: Shao Ren Me was the elder brother of Run Run Shaw.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭于1959年与郭碧瑜结婚，后离婚。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng married Guo Biyu in 1959, and they later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 邵淑琦是邵维铭的独生女。
description.en: Shao Shuqi is the only daughter of Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 邵淑琦是郭碧瑜的独生女。
description.en: Shao Shuqi is the only daughter of Guo Biyu.

description.zh-cn: 郭碧瑜是新加坡矿业大王郭洪之女。
description.en: Guo Biyu is the daughter of Singaporean mining tycoon Guo Hong.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭于1932年1月30日出生于新加坡。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng was born in Singapore on January 30, 1932.

description.zh-cn: 在邵维铭出生时，新加坡是英属海峡殖民地的一部分。
description.en: At the time of Shao Vee-Meng's birth, Singapore was part of the British Straits Settlements.

relationships.target: 牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭毕业于牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院法律系。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng graduated from the Faculty of Law at St Catherine's College, Oxford.

relationships.source: 牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 圣凯瑟琳学院是牛津大学的组成学院之一。
description.en: St Catherine's College is a constituent college of the University of Oxford.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭在格雷律师学院获得执业律师资格。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng qualified as a barrister at Gray's Inn.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭回到新加坡后，协助其伯父兼养父邵仁枚打理生意。
description.en: After returning to Singapore, Shao Vee-Meng assisted his uncle and adoptive father Shao Ren Me in managing his business.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭担任邵氏基金会主席。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng serves as the Chairman of the Shaw Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 2006年11月，亚太影展授予邵逸夫“终生成就奖”，由其子邵维铭代为领取。
description.en: In November 2006, the Asia-Pacific Film Festival awarded Run Run Shaw the 'Lifetime Achievement Award', which was accepted on his behalf by his son Shao Vee-Meng.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭是新加坡国立大学最久和最慷慨的单独赞助人之一，曾捐赠逾千万美元。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng is one of the longest and most generous individual benefactors of the National University of Singapore, having donated over ten million US dollars.

description.zh-cn: 邵维铭自1983年起担任新加坡法国语文学院主席。
description.en: Shao Vee-Meng has served as the President of the Alliance Française de Singapour since 1983.

relationships.target: 新加坡国立预防犯罪协会
新加坡亚洲文明博物馆

description.zh-cn: 2011年，法国政府授予邵维铭法国国家荣誉军团司令级勋章。
description.en: In 2011, the French government awarded Shao Vee-Meng the rank of Commander of the Legion of Honour.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，新加坡政府授予邵维铭公众服务勋章。
description.en: In 1994, the Government of Singapore awarded Shao Vee-Meng the Public Service Medal.

relationships.source: 牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 1993年，邵维铭获委任为牛津大学圣凯瑟琳学院院士。
description.en: In 1993, Shao Vee-Meng was appointed a Fellow of St Catherine's College, Oxford.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，新加坡国立大学授予邵维铭荣誉文学博士学位。
description.en: In 2003, the National University of Singapore conferred upon Shao Vee-Meng an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.
